definition: Matsushita (name)/Panasonic (brand), abbr. for 松下電器|松下电器[Song1 xia4 Dian4 qi4]
loose/to loosen/to relax/floss (dry, fluffy food product made from shredded, seasoned meat or fish, used as a topping or filling)
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
Panasonic Corporation (formerly Matsushita Electric Industrial Co.)

pinyin: song1 xia4 dian4 qi4 gong1 ye4

sentences.english: Panasonic could have a tougher time resolving other issues.
sentences.chinese: 松下在解决其它事项时可能有一段更困难的时间。

sentences.english: This information will be posted to the Panasonic LUMIX Global Site soon very soon.
sentences.chinese: 此信息将被张贴到松下Lumix全球网站很快很快。

sentences.english: An encouraging outlook for electronics maker Panasonic lifted market sentiment.
sentences.chinese: 电子产品制造商松下电器前景乐观，增加了市场信心。

sentences.english: Orioles are singing under the beauty pine.
I have one USA version PCDP from Panasonic.
sentences.chinese: 我有一个美版的松下随身听。

sentences.english: Finally, Matsushita promotes managerial continuity through long job tenure.
sentences.chinese: 最后松下通过延长任职期，推进管理的延续性。

sentences.english: Panasonic Electronic Devices Co. , Ltd. mainly produces speakers.
sentences.chinese: 松下电子部品主要生产扬声器。

sentences.english: Panasonic needs to fix this in any future GF2.
sentences.chinese: 松下需要固定在任何未来GF2系列这一点。

sentences.english: In the last few years Panasonic have really listened to many people, myself included.
sentences.chinese: 在过去的几年里松下确实听了很多人，包括我自己。

sentences.english: Lower one messenger rope to the mooring boat from portside.
sentences.chinese: 自左舷松下一根引缆给带缆船。

sentences.english: Clove strength to panasonic, exclamation ZhaoEr big niang.
sentences.chinese: 丁香松下劲来，感叹着儿大不由娘。

sentences.english: As such it helped to attract new target groups for Panasonic.
sentences.chinese: 这也为松下赢得了新的目标群体。

sentences.english: Mr Noda is the first Matsushita alumnus to lead Japan.
sentences.chinese: 野田佳彦是松下政经塾第一位执掌日本的校友。

sentences.english: Matsushita executives are noted for spending less time in their offices.
sentences.chinese: 松下公司的行政主管在办公室的时间较少是出名的。

sentences.english: Panasonic and Sony are already BIG players in the video digital camera market.
sentences.chinese: 松下和索尼已经在视频数字相机市场大玩家。

sentences.english: Panasonic was prouder than a Mum on graduation day when it announced its new 3D camcorder last week.
sentences.chinese: 松下在上周高调发布了最新3D摄像机。
